basic_information.scholarship_name: Stanley W. and Angela S. Case Endowed Memorial Scholarship Fund in Mass Communication
basic_information.committee_name: CLA - Mass Comm Stanley Case Scholarship

description: This scholarship was established in honor of veteran news anchor, broadcast journalist, UCO Distinguished Alumnus, and inaugural Luminary Society member, Stanley Case. It is awarded to a Mass Communication Professional Media major. Eligibility Requirements Complete application Upload official or unofficial transcript Must be a Sophomore, Junior, or Senior with at least one more semester before graduation Minimum 3.0 GPA Preference given to students who have completed 4 of the required courses in the Professional Media degree program Must have desire to begin a career in broadcasting after graduation This scholarship is available to apply for during the current UCO student application period.

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
